Field.Label: Configure Devices for Google Home / Assistant
Configure which Indigo devices are controllable via the Google Home integration.
Only the devices specified below will be visible to Google Home / Assistant. Select a device to edit or click Add to publish additional devices to Google Home.
This function will dump the details of a plugin device to the Indigo Event Log to aid in debugging and forum posts.
